name: Novice Philosopher '25
description: AI researcher, philosopher, and technologist pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence and human-machine synergy. Sergio Cayuqueo is redefining how AI agents evolve, collaborate, and design the future. A deep thinker, writer, and innovator shaping the next frontier of intelligence.

shortcuts.name: Contact
shortcuts.description: Feel free to reach out to me via email if you have a project in mind, or maybe just say 'hi'. I don't mind making new friends.
